Package com.tloj.game.utilities

Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.utilities.MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer extends Object
Class that represents a music player in the game
Used to play music files in the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MusicPlayer(String pathName)
    Constructs a MusicPlayer object with the specified file path.
    MusicPlayer(String pathName, Runnable onEnd)
    Constructs a MusicPlayer object with the specified file path and action to be performed when the music ends.

  • Constructor Details

    • MusicPlayer

      public MusicPlayer(String pathName)
      Constructs a MusicPlayer object with the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      pathName - the path of the music file to be played

    • MusicPlayer

      public MusicPlayer(String pathName, Runnable onEnd)
      Constructs a MusicPlayer object with the specified file path and action to be performed when the music ends.
      Parameters:
      pathName - the path of the music file to be played
      onEnd - the action to be performed when the music ends

      Sets a new file to be played.

      public void stop()
      Stops the currently playing music.

      Increases the volume of the currently playing music.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount by which to increase the volume

    • playMusic

      Plays the music file.

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic(boolean loop)
      Plays the music file with the option to loop.
      Parameters:
      loop - true if the music should loop, false otherwise
